mcq.statement: Which major political party rejected the C. R. formula and why?

options.a: Indian National Congress, due to lack of independence
options.b: Muslim League, due to two-nation theory
options.c: British Government, due to administrative reasons

mcq.one_liner: The Muslim League rejected the C. R. formula because it viewed Muslims and Hindus as **two separate nations**.

suggestions.topic: Quaid-e-Azam as President of Muslim League
